title: Spoon
description: Pointed oval bowl, matte gilded obverse and reverse. In bowl, bright-cut engraving ornament of vaguely Japanese inspiration, an articulated chevron. Stem of square section, twisted. Finial of flattened spherical turned but-ton with central bead. Stem and finial of plain silver. Pointed oval bowl. Matte gilded obverse and reverse. In bowl, bright-cut engraving of vaguely Japanese inspiration of an articulated chevron patternStem of square section, twisted to form spiral. Finial of flattened spher-ical turned button with central bead. Stem and finial of plain silver.
name: Spoon
